channel.title: [09/09 - 09/15] MITB News
channel.description:
[quote="Moparisthebest, post:13, topic:142640"]If someone wants to write news articles, anyone has always been able to PM me a news story for me to post on there with credit.[/quote]
We'll collectively make a news article summarizing this week at MITB. I need you guys to contribute snippets of news, which I or someone else will compile and give to MITB to post on the front page.
Eventually, if this gets big, we may make it into a podcast, as per [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,194397.0.html]killerman93's idea.[/url]
Try to keep it concise and to the point. Example:
[code] On Wednesday, Mopman and therealjdb were given Global Moderator status. Congratz, guys! [/code]

item.title: [09/09 - 09/15] MITB News
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

This Week in Review [09/09 - 09/15]

On Sunday, Speljohan released the source for Ares and it's updater without permission from its original creators, Ollie and Ruler.
Ollie and Speljohan received Java Guru awards.  SomethingToHide received a Graphics Master award.  xxlegitxx received a Web Developer award.
ThugLife attempted to persuade Moparisthebest to include a Linux Expert badge, which Moparisthebest deferred.
Yz85Racer finds a 'lump on [his] tit' this Monday.
Opera gets much more exposure in the MITB community as a note-worthy browser.
As we <b>commemorate</b> the sixth <b>anniversary</b> of 9-11, multiple debates rage regarding the conspiracy theories.
Solemage wins SOTW 6.  Good work, Solemage.  Fastbawlz began SOTW 7, and introduced a new GFX competition, the LPOTM.
This Wednesday, Lothy, Mopman, and therealjdb were given Global Moderator status.  Congratz, guys!
Community panics as therealjdb cracks down on rule breakers. Concerns of possible warning system failure arise.
io9, also known as ilyaostr9 and Ilya Ostrovskiy, finally quit this Thursday.  Some rejoice; others are saddened by his departure.
Miss Silabsoft completes her first attempt at converting RS models into obj format; it's stuffed.

Acceptable?

Read full topic

item.title: [09/09 - 09/15] MITB News
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

The new news page phailed after a stream of idiots began posting stupid, pointless and nonrelevant articles. The idea was close to being scrapped when a Greeny came along to save the day.

It’s a nice idea, but who gets to add the news? Are you going to make a system where people can add the snippets and then they must get approved?

Read full topic

item.title: [09/09 - 09/15] MITB News
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Silver Lining:

Debatable, and I think news, unless stated otherwise, should be purely factual.

io9, also known as ilyaostr9 and Ilya Ostrovskiy, announced his departure from MITB forums.  Most members rejoiced.  The rest didn't care.

Better?

Read full topic
